name: Bend
flavor: Increase the flexibility of Earth, for a time.

purposeDescriptions.low: subtly increases the flexibility of Earth for a short time
purposeDescriptions.mid: allows Earth to bend like rubber for a short time
purposeDescriptions.high: allows Earth to flow like honey for a short time
purposeDescriptions.invLow: subtly increases the rigidity of Earth for a short time
purposeDescriptions.invMid: greatly increases the rigidity of Earth, causing it to crumble under force
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: makes Earth so rigid that it crumbles to dust under its own forces
